plot outline: Interplay of life's basic questions about love, money, success and morality. A young (Shashi) leaves the pretentious lifestyle of his father and ends up being a gambler. Differences between him and his love ends up with him loosing his love and makes him a vagabond till he is taken under her wings by (Nanda), who begins to like him. The new love transforms him and he starts on his path of righteousness. This doesn't last and ends with a misunderstanding that makes him travel to Delhi, the same place where his first love (Tanuja) is. A murder follows and the end results with an unexpected outcome.
title: Juari
plot: A young man falls into the path of gambling and fraud after experiencing betrayal in love from one woman after another. But, finally he finds out that honesty is the best path.
